strings.Value: "I've used nearly all my spells. It seems that when we fight, you all just hide behind me and watch while I do everything!"
"I'm almost out of spells… Sometimes I feel I'm the only one who does anything useful during our battles!"
"Am I wrong, or is Sir Jubilost truly accusing us of cowardice? Why don't you speak your mind plainly — and afterwards defend your words in a proper duel?"
"So much pride, so much empty boasting! It's sad that such a talented gnome as yourself would waste his breath on such petty ranting!"
"Ha! Everyone — in the next battle we should just sit on the grass and watch this gnome deal with the enemies on his own. — And he'd better not yap a single word about needing our help!"
"An empty vessel makes louder sounds than a full barrel."
